review_text:
Great house, we enjoyed our stay as we were only a mile from
Our relatives home that we were in town to visit.
When needing a place to stay in Norfolk, don’t pass this place up.
Beautiful, spacious, comfortable and clean. Modern decorations. Beautiful yard. Loved the open layout and big windows. I would easily book again.

My parents and I were attending a graduation and wanted something more comfortable than a hotel room. This house was perfect for our needs. The beds and linens were so comfortable, the kitchen had everything we needed, the windows all through the home were exquisite, there really was nothing Danielle had not thought of. The furnishings and accents were on point and tasteful. For me the ideal AirBnB is a space that could be your second home. A space that feels like it could be yours - comfortable, well-appointed, and peaceful. This house was all of this.
Great communication and exactly as described… looking forward to our next stay.

We loved this home. It provided every need we had for this trip. It was beautifully decorated, the kitchen had ample supply of updated cookware and appliances. The laundry room had everything we needed and same with both bathrooms. The place was very clean and and made me feel comfortable and safe. The bed was very comfortable. I travel with a bedtopper and sheets and did not need them. We loved all the windows and looking out from the hilltop down to the city lights. We also enjoyed walking the neighborhood each day to get some exercise. The one car garage was perfect for our mid size suv. It has a large back yard that we could enjoy with kids or a dog, play some lawn games etc. The host was very responsive and had a welcome brochure with local restaurants and activities etc. We loved this place so much, we are booking it for a family reunion event coming up this summer.
This was my second stay at this house, and third at one of Danielle’s properties. We always enjoy our stay, and appreciate all of the care and details she puts into her properties.

My husband and I and 2 of our grown children, son in law, and one grandchild stayed during the process of my brother's death and funeral. Danielle was very kind and understanding during this difficult time. The house is beautiful, clean, and everything we needed was there for our comfort. The view out the East top floor living room windows is breathtaking! I would love to stay here again, and will book this house if it is available on our next trip to Norfolk.
This house is beautiful and we had a wonderful stay. Thank you very much!
We stayed for 10 days. Very comfortable beds and linens! Spacious and uncluttered! Danielle was responsive to early requests for additional amenities to make our stay more comfortable.
great space to feel comfortable in your stay in the City!!

This property is exactly as described and exceeded our expectation. Danielle was always on point with communication from before arrival to the end of our stay. We loved staying here and HIGHLY recommend it.

very beautiful home ,
but It was har to use AC controller, other than that everything was perfect.
is still a great place.
Danielle was very easy to work with. house was clean and suited us well. Absolutely no issues. would stay again without question.
it is a comfortable, clean, tidy and quiet place, it had everything necessary for our stay.

Wonderful stay at Danielle’s Home. Quiet neighborhood, great backyard with a wonderful view. Comfortable beds, and furniture. The basement set up was our favorite spot to lounge and watch tv. Kitchen was stocked with the essentials for making meals. I highly recommend staying when in Norfolk, we plan to do the same when back in town.
Looked great - very nice with two completely separate living areas so for a business trip easy to share with colleagues.
Great set up and lovely decor, this house was perfect for our stay!
I will continue to stay at this location when in town. By far the cleanest, easiest to access, host great, and overall layout of house was great.
Really nice place and great location. Felt at home and Danielle was very responsive when I had a question. We will definitely stay here again for the next family event!

Amazing home to stay in! Great location in Norfolk, quiet neighborhood. Danielle was a great host - super responsive to messages and left great instructions on how to get inside and great recommendations for things to do around Norfolk. The house matched the pictures, and well stocked with dishes and kitchen appliances, linens and towels. We will definitely stay here again on our next trip back to Norfolk.
Great place, very clean and plenty of room.
Beautiful home!

Great place to stay! Open floor plan with great kitchen! Beds were comfortable! Plenty of space like in her photos! Very modern. Nicely done bath. Nice to see grill in garage if needed. Wifi was easy to access!
The house was nice and clean. The beds were comfy and the furniture was very trendy but not super comfortable.
I can see why they say this place is a rare find! It was a perfect house to stay at! Everything about the house and area was perfect!

We really enjoyed the time we spend in this property, there is plenty of room and very well decorated We will definitely stay here again
Daniele’s communication is fast and helpful.

Good place to stay!

Everything was great, the apartment was clean. Almost in the city center. The owner was helpful.
Everything was comfortable and clean.
a very cozy, clean and tidy place.

We had a great experience with Josie! She was so friendly and the apartment was better than described. We had family in for Thanksgiving and they raved about the accommodations! Thank you for taking one thing off my list of things to worry about! We hope to book with y’all in the future!
Great place , that fit all our needs
Great location, very clean and accommodating and a wonderful host. Will be back!
Beautiful home and great host. Keypad to the door stopped working and she responded to me immediately and helped us get in. Quiet and peaceful. Very clean and spacious

Elizabeth was very responsive and gave clear instructions on how to get into the home. There was a book that explained everything about the cabin and property. this was very helpful when we needed stuff or how to get something to work. The cabin was adorable! It was clean, organized, and had everything that we needed. It was only a few minutes from Norfolk but had an country feel which was a perfect combination. My family is already asking when we can book it again.
Spring Cabin was such a welcoming home. Very well stocked with so many extra amenities. Host was very responsive. Our family felt right at home.
Always a pleasure staying at this beautiful house. It's always super clean and Elizabeth is a great host. Highly recommended to all.
Great place to stay. Our family felt right at home. We would definitely recommend if you are visiting Norfolk! Thanks again!
nice house
Great place for a group to stay!
This is a great value for the money. Very peaceful and calm. Elizabeth was always available and very helpful. Would highly recommend this great experience to anyone.

Second time staying here, and it was wonderful both times. Great for a family, comfortable home. Everything was clean and in great order. We’ve only stayed in winter, so haven’t used the outdoor space but it looks great.
Elizabeth house was very clean and comfortable. Very informative with instructions. I would highly recommend for anyone else looking to stay in lake Dallas.
This was the perfect quiet get away for a weekend. We were looking for a nice place to just hang out and relax and this was perfect!

We enjoyed our stay tremendously! From the moment we walked in, the place was spotless and welcoming. It had all the amenities and was warm cozy and comfortable. The hosts communicated well and we’re always responsive with our needs. Highly recommend!!!
Great place to stay! House was cozy and laid out well for two families to stay together. Very clean and comfortable!
Everything was great! Highly recommended
Elizabeth was very accommodating for making adjustments prior to our stay and very responsive to questions that came up during our stay! Great home and would recommend to anyone visiting the area!
Cabin was beautiful. Thanks for letting us stay there!

My original reservation was cancelled by AirBnB the day of! I received notification whilst on the road. I was able to book this beautiful cabin on short notice and it exceeded my expectations.
This cabin is close enough to town to be convenient, but just far outside of city limits to feel remote. The cabin was spotless with every amenity I could have asked for.
There were plenty of nightlights, K-Cups, even foil and baggies. The beds and pillows were top notch. I enjoyed sitting on the porch, having a cuppa and watching the sunrise over the prairie.
My stay in Norfolk was enjoyable!
We had an excellent stay, with room for the whole family. Home is very nicely decorated and well taken care of. Would absolutely stay here again next time we visit the area.
Worked for us
We felt very comfortable and enjoyed the private location
We really enjoyed our stay at this beautiful cabin. Extremely clean, comfortable beds and extra touches made my family feel at home! We will book again next time we are in the Norfolk area.
A great location and property that exceeded out needs.
An excellent place to rest after a great day of work, comfortable, spacious, clean and safe.

Property was great! It was our meeting place between Wayne Nebraska and Midtown Event Center. We did struggle with door code, but they called and had a backup plan. Wished we had more time to enjoy the patio & outdoors!

Elizabeth’s cabin was awesome! We were working in Norfolk and it was perfect to get away from the ordinary hotel room. I would book here for leisure also! Beautiful house with great amenities. Would recommend and stay again!
Host was very helpful and responsive. Had a great stay and will definitely book here again next time we are in the area!

Beautiful log cabin just outside town that gives you a taste of country living with convenience. The landscaping and sun room were a beautiful bonus. The home was very clean with a lovely, unique layout.
While it did not bother us, the upper level master bedroom and bath lack privacy - as the bedroom has no door. Walking up the stairs off the family room offers a view of the bed. The bathroom door does not lock and has a sliding farmhouse/barn door. We let our children know to announce themselves before coming up the stairs and really had no issue, but this may be something to consider for some parties.
Elizabeth was fantastic and very responsive. We would highly recommend this property and will definitely be back!
Always a great stay, and so clean and comfortable. A nice quiet get away indeed.
This cabin looked exactly like the pictures and very clean. Would definitely stay here again.
It was good place to stay. Clean and comfortable.
Beautiful home. Very comfortable and clean. 10/10 would recommend.

We really enjoyed our stay while we were in town for district softball. We had plenty of room for my family of 3 and my in-laws. Definitely will stay here again if we need to be in Norfolk for anything!
Wonderful stay at Spring Branch! Nice house, very clean and comfortable, exactly as described. Elizabeth was responsive and made us feel welcome.
Great private location. Really neat house and layout
This was a wonderful place to host a group of friend’s for a laid back bachelorette party. There was room to relax and hangout. The cabin was cozy and charming!
A true gem in Norfolk and just lucky to get the chance to stay there! Beth is extremely helpful, communicated great and is always there if you need her. Highly recommend

Absolutely A+. Very comfy and inviting. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. All accommodations were neat and clean. We felt right at home the moment we arrived. Terrific hostess! I highly recommend! We’d definitely stay again when back in the area.
It was a great place very peaceful to relax after a busy day.

Cant say enough about this place! My crew says they sleep the best when staying at Beths place. Nice and quiet and secluded.
Excellent host and exceptional place
Excellent place. Clean, updated and an excellent overall experience. Highly recommend!

A great place to stay! Very quiet, very peaceful. If your looking to relax and get away this place is the one! Very clean, super cozy feeling and all around a great place to unwind and chill out at. Close to town too.

I COULDN’T IMAGINE BRINGING KIDS HERE FOR ANYTIME, WITHOUT A SIMILAR EXPERIENCE!
I travel for a living. I stay in a lot of these types of establishments, and I also bring the entire family to vacation in places like this. NEVER have I had a bad review or had to leave one.
•3 overnight guest in total including myself, but I was treated like we were throwing a party. ( we choose to stay there to ride atvs at the local track)
They watched the place constantly, and noted who came and went.
•They complained about how I left the place, even though I went through and picked up 99% of our mess for them. Including: putting dishes in the dish washer, collecting all dirty laundry into a basket, and left the trash bag outside.
•They also are trying to charge me for surface scratches on a few chairs ( literally the area your butt sits on.) my 2 roommates left after night 1 and I went solo the last night.
Cabin, communication, ease- 8/10
Whatever is going on here - 2/10
Flexible helpful cleanest home I have stayed. Pleasant decor would stay there again

Beth was a great host who stays in touch with you and has a very beautiful place that is super quiet and cozy.
Would totally recommend this to anybody staying in the Norfolk area.
The cabin was a perfect place for my sister, brother and I to stay while in the area for our uncles 90th birthday celebration. It had everything we hoped for.
Great place to stay. Very comfortable. Elizabeth was very helpful with local recommendations and included a gift bags featuring local vendors. Very nice touch.
This was the perfect place to relax between shows. Thanks for having us!
Great place and great hosts. Anyone staying in the Norfolk area should check out this home.
10 stars ⭐️ telling all my friends don’t miss this
Host was wonderful. Communication from beginning to end. Beautiful and spacious home. Would stay here again if in the area.

Beautiful log cabin! Nicely furnished and very cozy! I don’t like microfiber sheets, but I brought my own, so if you’re like me, do the same! Also, if you are sensitive to road noise, that may be an issue for you, as the road out front is a 65 mph highway in a residential area.

Spring Branch cabin was a perfect place for us to stay in the Norfolk area. The cabin was extremely clean. The bedding and the towels were all top notch. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks for the nice stay!

Exactly what we were looking for! Outside of Norfolk, but minutes to the restaurants, shops, and bars in downtown. The home was spotless, the layout of the bedrooms was perfect for privacy, and we especially enjoyed watching the sunsets from the sunroom. We'll be back again soon!
Great space!

This is a great house. It was clean, and everything in the house worked wonderfully. Lots of small touches like light switch panels that were labeled so you knew which switch did what. Kitchen was well stocked with dishes, pans, silverware, etc. We didn't really have much need for communication as we didn't have any issues, but every message from Elizabeth was clear and friendly. We would definitely stay here again.

We were in town for a family funeral. When we walked in to the Airbnb there was a sympathy flower bouquet and a goody tray, it touched my heart. The place was as pictured, it was wonderful. The beds were great, and there was lots of space to spread out. Our family from out of state came by to check it out also for future trips, we all loved it. It was a beautiful log cabin, 5 min from our family's house. we'll be back!
Great place and great people!

My first stay in a log cabin in winter!
This place is super comfy and clean, I will definitely book again if given the chance.
We stayed here over Christmas and it was the most perfect and relaxing winter getaway! Everything was clean, spotless, and decorated so cute. We felt right at home. Highly recommend!

Such a perfect location for a weekend or a month. Gorgeous cabin style with all the modern touches. Beautifully decorated, spacious, warm and cozy especially in 5 degree weather. The usable garage was icing on the cake. right off the highway and 10 min from the downtown Norfolk with shops and restaurants One of my most memorable stays on Airbnb. The host thought of everything. Thx Elizabeth 🙏

This was a beautiful comfortable everything you could ask for stay.
I loved the golf course view ... even though I didn't get to stay long enough to truly enjoy.... But everything about this location was perfect.

This is a great place to stay. Very cozy, clean, beds are excellent, showers work great and a great place for 6. Really enjoyed the stay.
Absolutely loved staying here!
The house was quaint and quiet. Howie is adorable and a very good co-host.
This is the perfect farm get away! It’s so cute and clean, and it’s more spacious than you’d think. It’s just what we hoped for!
I was only there for 5 hours, but it was great! Wish I could have been there longer. Look forward to staying there again!
The palce is amazing, peaceful vibe. We enjoyed every minute of it, felt so relax when we left. So happy to have found this cottage, 5 Star RECOMMENDED
Loved the place and Howie the dog is so sweet too!!
Diane’s place was perfect and was exactly as described. We felt right at home and slept great. We enjoyed the outdoor space and really appreciated the coffee and sugar supplied.
The Windmill Cottage was perfect in every way. Immaculate. Everything I needed. If you love farms this is the place to stay. I loved it.
Absolutely beautiful little cottage! Comfy, cozy, stocked with anything you could possibly need and tastefully decorated. We will definitely be back this summer!!
The best place, one of the best host ever !!!highly recommended!!!

I have stayed at alot of places and this place was very peaceful and felt at home. Diane left great snacks and drinks for us aswell and regret not having enough time to use the firepit outside. She was very responsive and answered all my questions.I loved this place!!!

Enjoyed my stay at the Windmill Cottage! Needed a quiet peaceful place to unwind and this was perfect. Took a quick trip to Norfolk (15min away) to grab some food supplies on the first day. House was very clean and bed was super comfortable. Loys of homey touches throughout! Really enjoyed meeting Howie, the mini beagle. What a sweetie! Thank you for a wonderful stay.
I always enjoy staying at the Cozy Windmill Cottage!
Great spot!
We always enjoy our stay looking forward to our next visit :)
very nice and clean everything we needed and more

We loved our visit at the Windmill cottage and hope to stay again when we visit family! It was warm and inviting and had everything we needed. Our daughter loved the farm dog and there were so many thoughtful touches around the house. Highly recommend!
Love this place. I am a repeat guest, and I always enjoy staying here, but the Christmas decorations during the Christmas season made the stay that much more enjoyable! Very thoughtful host.
Great value. Comfy house.

This AirBnb was like our own private slice of a beautiful Nebraska farm. The scenery was beautiful. The home was incredibly well maintained and clean. The home also had many amenities that made our stay that much more enjoyable. You could tell Diane put a lot of time and energy into making this home comfortable for her guests. We had a great time here! Couldn't recommend enough!

Windmill Cottage was fantastic. It was in a quiet, private location and close enough to our inlaws.
It was clean, and had all the amenities we needed. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great place to stay with privacy and close access to shopping, dining and entertainment.

We stayed at Diane’s place for close to 2 weeks and we felt right at home! We enjoyed the peacefulness the home provided. Diane was very easy to reach if we needed anything, we would stay here again in a heartbeat! An added bonus was the sweetest farm dog, Howie. I spent most mornings on the porch, drinking coffee and listening to the birds with Howie! Definitely recommend!

Very nice little cottage!

A great stay for a great price. the Host was very accommodating and understanding of all things that came up during my stay. Great area if your looking to be in the country in a private spot away from the city of Norfolk, but still within 15 minutes in order to get groceries and such.
Great place on a beautiful property. Exactly what we needed. Really cute cottage with great amenities. Diane was friendly and responsive.
I am so glad we found this little cottage. It was just as described. We were able to make our Thanksgiving dinner for our family in this home. We will be back!

peaceful, charming and very clean

This is a great, quite place in the country to stay at. It's very peaceful out in the country. Howie is so friendly! It's a great little two bedroom. Very well laid out and well stocked and equipped. Diane was a great host and very responsive.
I wish we had more time to sit and visit, or have a fire. Just didnt work out this time.

Very clean, very easy to locate, everything worked well. Beds comfortable and woke up well rested.
Definitely on our list to book again if the need arises.
Great host, great place, super nice, everything neat clean. Definitively recommended.

Easy to find and super quite. The 3 of us had plenty of room and house was syper clean. Relax outside on the porch with Howie. We were visiting Norfolk for a soccer tournament. The fields were literally 10 minutes away.

Windmill Cottage is in a beautiful rural setting. It is in great condition and nicely decorated. The beds were comfortable and the AC worked great for us on these 100 degree days! There was plenty of bedding and pillows, towels and dishes, and even some snacks for us in the kitchen and in the fridge. We really enjoyed meeting their dog, Howie...he is very sweet and friendly. I wished we'd had more time to hang out there and play the games provided in the cottage. Maybe next time! We would definitely stay here again!

Amazing stay! Clean, comfortable and so many unexpected and appreciated extras. We loved it! Especially loved the miniature beagle, who bounded toward us for pets whenever he spied us hanging on the porch!
Great place to stay very clean.

This is a great place to stay! Private and peaceful and the host is very accommodating. The cottage is very cute and well supplied. My kiddo loved playing on the tire swing in the yard.

Nice house. Quiet, private, comfortable place.

Great place!

Such a cozy cottage on a peaceful farm close to town for lots of restaurants and shopping. The hosts were so accommodating and gracious. The space was very well stocked with lots of thoughtful touches. So affordable too!

Great little slice of heaven out in the country. I loved the added bonus of puppies greeting me morning and night! Even little sweet old man Howie was great! Diane was great at communicating and responding if issues arose.
Great place to stay. Very peaceful and beautiful location.
peaceful, quiet country cottage
Quiet, relaxing place to stay! Loved every minute of our stay at the Cottage and hope to return in the future! Host was very friendly and accommodating to our travel needs!

Very quiet, relaxing, and peaceful place to stay! Host was easy to contact and prompt with replies. She was also very accommodating to our travel requests. We will be returning very soon!

PERFECT! Diane’s airbnb met and exceeded every one of our expectations! It was quiet, peaceful, comfortable, beautiful, and Diane was so hospitable! Would definitely stay again!

Diane’s cottage is an all around gem. It’s situated in a peaceful, serene setting and it’s chalk full of anything you’d need. It really can’t be beat. We had a great time and will definitely be visiting again!

This was a great experience, the cottage was very welcoming with a friendly beagle, games, TV, and plenty of space for our family. Norfolk was a short drive and had plenty of parks to keep our kids busy each day. I highly recommend staying here!

I came to Windmill cottage for a week of rest and relaxation, and found all that and more! Diane’s family and sweet dog Howie were the most wonderful hosts and made sure I had everything I needed for my stay. I can’t wait to come back!

Diane's Cottage was amazing. Super clean and had alot of little things alot of other places don't have. Everytime I came home for the evening I felt like it was actually home. Super host is a well earned name for her!

Wonderful stay. I stayed here for a month while visiting family and Diane's place was a great value. Great location close to Norfolk (~15mins), comfy home, and beautiful surroundings. It was safe on the property and even though it is a working farm it was relatively quiet. Everyone I met on the property was friendly and caring. I would totally stay here again and recommend to others.
Quick story - I am not from the midwest, so my first week there was a crazy thunderstorm that hit overnight with a tornado warning issued in the area. I was sleeping like a baby when this was all happening, and Diane had the forethought to call me at 1am to let me know that I needed to get into the basement for safety. I was freaking out and she helped calm me down and guided me to find the basement I had not bothered to find previously. All was well and we were safe, but the next day her and her family took care of cleaning up the branches in the aftermath and checked on me. Seems kind of silly to share, but it says so much about a host who not only takes care of the property, but also guests.

Diane’s cottage was a perfect setting with farmland all around. It was quiet and peaceful listening to the birds everyday. It was nostalgic for my husband who grew up on a farm nearby . The cottage was clean and equipped with everything we needed for our stay. Diane was also very helpful in suggestions for local activities and dining.We hope to go again.

Windmill Cottage is a delightful place to stay. It is surrounded by beautiful trees and fertile farmland and is so nice and quiet and peaceful, yet close to both Madison and Norfolk so that you can quickly be in town enjoying restaurants and movies and parks and walking trails and shopping and more. The house is clean and wonderfully decorated in a way that brings back so much nostalgia for simpler days, while having all the modern amenities you may desire. The value of what you get for the cost is amazing, the host is very wonderful and responsive with communication, and you will find yourself enjoying a very comfortable, peaceful stay if you choose to come here.
On a lighter yet important note: I've never stayed anywhere that was so well stocked with bath towels and face cloths and toilet paper for your bathroom needs. In fact we were all talking about how we always traveled with extra supplies because the places we would stay would be so meagerly stocked. Windmill Cottage looks out for your needs and comforts!
We will definitely stay again and we've recommended it to family and friends and will continue to do so. We can't wait to come back again.
Great location private discrete great price
Nice quiet place to stay. The decorations were amazing.
Very charming farm house with beautiful scenery and gorgeous sunsets! Wonderful hosts with thoughtful touches. Perfect place to relax and unwind.

What an absolute ranch-cottage dream! Everything felt like you were right at home (which is huge for me because I travel often). I couldn’t have asked for a more pleasant stay. We all wish we could have stayed longer! My family made such beautiful memories and we have Diane and her wonderful family to thank for sharing their beautiful property and cottage with us. Staying in a hotel will never compare to the feeling of HOME. Thank you so much again.
- The Hanreich-Mays’s
As a return visit, it was a consistent experience. 5 stars across the board. Extremely prompt and caring responses. Definitely one of the best hosts I’ve come in contact with.

This cottage was an absolute goldmine. The perfect getaway from the troubles of the world. Not only was the host extremely prompt, but went above and beyond to make the check-in as turn key as possible. The property was stylish and thoughtful, providing a very enjoyable experience.
I would absolutely recommend this cottage and plan to stay again in the very near future.

A very quaint, pleasant house! Everything was clean and orderly. Diane even left a bottle of wine in the fridge for us! The one thing that I had a hard time with was the water. It smelled like surfer which made it difficult to shower in, and made me uncomfortable drinking it. However Diane provided some bottle water which helped!
Great place, would stay again!

Had an amazing stay with Diane at the Windmill Cottage! I was working in the area (in the wind industry ironically) and stayed for several months. She was a most gracious host and very responsive to any needs I had. The cottage was perfect for my needs and hope I can stay there again if I am ever in the area again!

Such a wonderful place to simply relax and turn off all the chaos that surrounds us this day and time. I have really enjoyed my time on the farm and hope to again return one day. Exceptional host that are most helpful in any way. and a beautiful place to reside.

Such a wonderful place to simply relax and turn off all the chaos that surrounds us this day and time. I have really enjoyed my time on the farm and hope to someday return... Great place to stay and exceptional host! Very friendly folks and helpful in any way.
Beautiful, clean place. Great overall experience.

Diane was an excellent hostess throughout our stay. The property and her doggo were both lovely. All amenities that we needed were there, and Diane went above and beyond in making our trip an enjoyable one!

This place is awesome. It is just like the pictures or even better. It is an entire 2 bedroom house to yourself with a well stocked kitchen. Decorations are super nice. Comfy bed, plenty of room to eat, TV with Roku. Also Diane was an amazing host and easy to communicate with. We hope to come back and stay again.
Very comfortable beds.

Such a wonderful place to stay! Everything was great and Melissa went above and beyond as a host. It truly was a home away from home for us while visiting. Melissa’s thoughtfulness made us feel welcome and made our trip super easy. Would definitely stay again. Book this lovely, warm home- you won’t regret it!
The house is cozy and was nice to hang out in for quiet evenings after visiting family. Melissa was always responsive, and the thoughtful touches throughout were so appreciated.
Nice clean place!
Melissa was very accommodating to my families needs. The house was absolutely amazing. We were very comfortable and felt right at home. Will be booking with her in the future

We stayed here during a visit for Northeast’s graduation! Little did we know that this house was literally across the street and around the corner from the college! Super convenient! Walking distance if needed to be!
We also loved the llama decor! My two year old loved finding all the random llama decor that was spread throughout the house! Also, super kid friendly! List of things to keep the little ones occupied such as games, books, blocks, movies, etc!
Overall I give this place 5 stars! Will stay here again if I ever need to stay in Norfolk again!
Great location! Wonderful well equipped home!!
Very relaxing and enjoyable place to stay, our home away from home when in Norfolk.

Melissa ! Than you !
